turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like to place an order for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti cafe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream, did i get it right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but can I have extra chocolate syrup in there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at the Starbucks in the Convention Center, 3rd Madison and Covington, Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 3rd and madison.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text. bye.
